Container.Name: ruTorrent
Container.Description: [br]This is a container for rTorrent (a powerful and flexible torrent client) and ruTorrent (a web based frontend for rTorrent). ruTorrent contains many plugins to improve rTorrent use including RSS support.[br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]Mount the internal directory ""/config"" to a location on your array for rTorrent config and session files[br] [b]Mount the internal directory ""/download"" to a location on your array for rTorrent downloads[br] [b]By default, the WebUI is accessible through http://IPADDRESS:8089.[br] [b]rTorrent config is done by editing the .rtorrent.rc file in /config[br]
